channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-22275|2024-08-03T18:37:18.446Z -- b%26r%20automation -- automation%20runtime%20webserver
item.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in B&R Automation Runtime webserver allows an unauthenticated network-based attacker to stop the cyclic program on the device and cause a denial of service.
